  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ServerScreenController()
    This class is the controller for the server screen, shows the connected clients in a table view and shows important information happening in the server through a text area ( all the informaiton is being printed to the text area).

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerScreenController

      public ServerScreenController()
      This class is the controller for the server screen, shows the connected clients in a table view and shows important information happening in the server through a text area ( all the informaiton is being printed to the text area).

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This method initialize the screen

    • connectPressed

      public void connectPressed()
      method called when the connect button was pressed in the GUI save the data from the GUI in a DataBaseConnectionDetails instance and initiate the connected clients table

    • disconnectPressed

      public void disconnectPressed()
      method called when the disconnect button was pressed in the GUI call the stop server function in the server and enable the connect form for reconnect

    • printToConsole

      This method prints to the console on the GUI and the regular console
